item.title: fixing a firewire audio interface
item.description: I had an issue where my Presonus Firestudio Project would have a red blinking light when I turned it on. This was before I even plugged it into my computer. Determining that it wasn't a software issue, I decided to open the thing up and figure out what's going on. I did the usual and checked for any bulging capacitors, burn marks, or just anything that would give me a clue why this wasn't working.
